snippet: Sandy Alderson said he would not trade a player the Mets envision using in the next two seasons for a shot at a playoff spot this year.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column on the New York Mets asserts that, with the nonwaiver trading deadline looming, small moves--or none at all--are better than bad moves, especially for a team that is focused on the future.
lead_paragraph: Sandy Alderson said he would not trade a player the Mets envision using in the next two seasons for a shot at a playoff spot this year.

headline.seo: Alderson Keep Mets Focused on Future
headline.main: For the Rebuilding Mets, the Future Is Not Now
headline.print_headline: For the Rebuilding Mets, the Future Is Not Now
